Summary: Triangle shape..approx 300 ft across silent numerous lights.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around July 30th 2010
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailstiangle shape...silent....approz 300ft across..approx 4-6 lights...off ground approx 100-200 ft flight pattern was from nw to se....stopping...huvering...very large..blocking clouds....then numerous helicopters started coming out..flying in circles around..within a mile of it....then the center light became very bright...and it was gone...just that fast....total view was approx 2 hrs..
